title: Figure of a Nubian Captive
description:
Small faience figure of a Nubian captive. The figure kneels upon a flat plinth with is arms bound tight against his sides (the cords are indicated on the rear of the arms and body). The rear of the head is flat. The figure is now a dark brownish green; the hair is black. 
Condition: Glaze darkened; small chips in plinth.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
